member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.CloseButtonVisible
member.summary: Get or set a value indicating whether the close button is displayed.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.MatchCase
member.summary: Get or set the state of the match case button.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.Search(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the text in the find box and performs a search.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.FindText
member.summary: The text in the find box. Setting the text clears any previous search results currently displayed.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.FocusFindText
member.summary: Sets input focus to the find box.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.FindTextSelectionStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting point of text selected in the find box.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.FindToolbar.FindTextSelectionLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the find box.

member.name: T:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSDynamicProperty
member.summary: Represents a dynamic javascript property in the render process to be added to a JSObject.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSDynamicProperty.PropertyGet
member.summary: Called if a script attempts to get the value of this dynamic property. It's up to the application to decide how to handle the request. See also description of CfrV8AccessorGetEventArgs. If the application does not subscribe to this event, the default action will be to return «undefined».

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSDynamicProperty.PropertySet
member.summary: Called if a script attempts to set the value of this dynamic property. It's up to the application to decide how to handle the request. See also description of CfrV8AccessorSetEventArgs. If the application does not subscribe to this event, the default action will be to silently ignore the request.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSDynamicProperty.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new dynamic javascript property to be added to a JSObject.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSDynamicProperty.#ctor(Chromium.WebBrowser.JSInvokeMode)
member.summary: Creates a new dynamic javascript property to be added to a JSObject.

member.name: T:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSFunction
member.summary: Represents a javascript function in the render process to be added as a property to a browser frame's global object or to a JSObject.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSFunction.Execute
member.summary: Javascript callback event for this function.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSFunction.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new javascript function to be added as a property to a browser frame's global object or to a child object.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSFunction.#ctor(Chromium.WebBrowser.JSInvokeMode)
member.summary: Creates a new javascript function to be added as a property to a browser frame's global object or to a child object.

member.name: T:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser
member.summary: Windows Forms webbrowser control based on ChromiumFX.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.DefaultBrowserSettings
member.summary: The CfxBrowserSettings applied for new instances of ChromiumWebBrowser. Any changes to these settings will only apply to new browsers, leaving already created browsers unaffected.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.OnBeforeCfxInitialize
member.summary: Provides an opportunity to change initialization settings and subscribe to browser process handler events.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.OnBeforeCommandLineProcessing
member.summary: Provides an opportunity to view and/or modify command-line arguments before processing by CEF and Chromium. The |ProcessType| value will be NULL for the browser process. Do not keep a reference to the CfxCommandLine object passed to this function. The CfxSettings.CommandLineArgsDisabled value can be used to start with an NULL command-line object. Any values specified in CfxSettings that equate to command-line arguments will be set before this function is called. Be cautious when using this function to modify command-line arguments for non-browser processes as this may result in undefined behavior including crashes.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.OnRegisterCustomSchemes
member.summary: Provides an opportunity to register custom schemes. Do not keep a reference to the |Registrar| object. This function is called on the main thread for each process and the registered schemes should be the same across all processes.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RemoteProcessCreated
member.summary: For each new render process created, provides an opportunity to subscribe to CfrRenderProcessHandler remote callback events.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize the ChromiumWebBrowser and ChromiumFX libraries. The application can change initialization settings by handling the OnBeforeCfxInitialize event.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Shutdown
member.summary: This function should be called on the main application thread to shut down the CEF browser process before the application exits.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.BrowserProcessHandler
member.summary: The CfxBrowserProcessHandler for this browser process. Do not access this property before calling ChromiumWebBrowser.Initialize()

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.FromCfxBrowser(Chromium.CfxBrowser)
member.summary: Returns the ChromiumWebBrowser object associated with the given CfxBrowser, or null if the CfxBrowser is not associated with any ChromiumWebBrowser object.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Browser
member.summary: Returns the CfxBrowser object for this ChromiumWebBrowser. Might be null if the browser has not yet been created. Wait for the BrowserCreated event before accessing this property.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.BrowserHost
member.summary: Returns the CfxBrowserHost object for this ChromiumWebBrowser. Might be null if the browser has not yet been created. Wait for the BrowserCreated event before accessing this property.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RemoteCallbackInvokeMode
member.summary: The invoke mode for this browser. See also JSInvokeMode. Changes to the invoke mode will be effective after the next time the browser creates a V8 context. If this is set to "Inherit", then "Invoke" will be assumed. The invoke mode also applies to VisitDom and EvaluateJavascript.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RemoteCallbacksWillInvoke
member.summary: Indicates whether render process callbacks on this browser will be executed on the thread that owns the browser's underlying window handle. Depends on the invoke mode. If the invoke mode is set to "Inherit", then "Invoke" will be assumed.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a ChromiumWebBrowser object with about:blank as initial URL. The underlying CfxBrowser is created immediately with the default CfxRequestContext.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a ChromiumWebBrowser object with about:blank as initial URL. If createImmediately is true, then the underlying CfxBrowser is created immediately with the default CfxRequestContext.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a ChromiumWebBrowser object with the given initial URL. The underlying CfxBrowser is created immediately with the default CfxRequestContext.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a ChromiumWebBrowser object with the given initial URL. If createImmediately is true, then the underlying CfxBrowser is created immediately with the default CfxRequestContext.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.CreateBrowser
member.summary: Creates the underlying CfxBrowser with the default CfxRequestContext. This method should only be called if this ChromiumWebBrowser was instanciated with createImmediately == false.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.CreateBrowser(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the underlying CfxBrowser with the default CfxRequestContext and the given initial URL. This method should only be called if this ChromiumWebBrowser was instanciated with createImmediately == false.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.CreateBrowser(System.String,Chromium.CfxRequestContext)
member.summary: Creates the underlying CfxBrowser with the given CfxRequestContext and initial URL. This method should only be called if this ChromiumWebBrowser was instanciated with createImmediately == false.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.CreateBrowser(Chromium.CfxRequestContext)
member.summary: Creates the underlying CfxBrowser with the given CfxRequestContext. This method should only be called if this ChromiumWebBrowser was instanciated with createImmediately == false.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.ContextMenuHandler
member.summary: Returns the context menu handler for this browser. If this is never accessed the default implementation will be used.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.LifeSpanHandler
member.summary: Returns the life span handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.LoadHandler
member.summary: Returns the load handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RequestHandler
member.summary: Returns the request handler for this browser. Do not set the return value in the GetResourceHandler event for URLs with associated WebResources (see also SetWebResource).

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.DisplayHandler
member.summary: Returns the display handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.DownloadHandler
member.summary: Returns the download handler for this browser. If this is never accessed downloads will not be allowed.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.DragHandler
member.summary: Returns the drag handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.DialogHandler
member.summary: Returns the dialog handler for this browser. If this is never accessed the default implementation will be used.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.FindHandler
member.summary: Returns the find handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.FocusHandler
member.summary: Returns the focus handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.GeolocationHandler
member.summary: Returns the geolocation handler for this browser. If this is never accessed geolocation access will be denied by default.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.JsDialogHandler
member.summary: Returns the js dialog handler for this browser. If this is never accessed the default implementation will be used.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.KeyboardHandler
member.summary: Returns the keyboard handler for this browser.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Url
member.summary: Returns the URL currently loaded in the main frame.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.IsLoading
member.summary: Returns true if the browser is currently loading.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.CanGoBack
member.summary: Returns true if the browser can navigate backwards.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.CanGoForward
member.summary: Returns true if the browser can navigate forwards.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.GoBack
member.summary: Navigate backwards.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.GoForward
member.summary: Navigate forwards.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.LoadUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Load the specified |url| into the main frame.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.LoadString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Load the contents of |stringVal| with the specified dummy |url|. |url| should have a standard scheme (for example, http scheme) or behaviors like link clicks and web security restrictions may not behave as expected.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.LoadString(System.String)
member.summary: Load the contents of |stringVal| with dummy url about:blank.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Find(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Search for |searchText|. |forward| indicates whether to search forward or backward within the page. |matchCase| indicates whether the search should be case-sensitive. Returns the identifier for this find operation (see also CfxFindHandler), or -1 if the browser has not yet been created.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Find(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Search for |searchText|. |forward| indicates whether to search forward or backward within the page. The search will be case-insensitive. Returns the identifier for this find operation (see also CfxFindHandler), or -1 if the browser has not yet been created.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.Find(System.String)
member.summary: Search for |searchText|. The search will be forward and case-insensitive. Returns the identifier for this find operation (see also CfxFindHandler), or -1 if the browser has not yet been created.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.FindToolbar
member.summary: Get the find toolbar of this browser window.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.ExecuteJavascript(System.String)
member.summary: Execute a string of javascript code in the browser's main frame. Execution is asynchronous, this function returns immediately. Returns false if the browser has not yet been created.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.ExecuteJavascript(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute a string of javascript code in the browser's main frame. The |scriptUrl| parameter is the URL where the script in question can be found, if any. The renderer may request this URL to show the developer the source of the error. The |startLine| parameter is the base line number to use for error reporting. Execution is asynchronous, this function returns immediately. Returns false if the browser has not yet been created.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RenderThreadInvoke(System.Delegate,System.Object[])
member.summary: Special Invoke for framework callbacks from the render process. Maintains the thread in the context of the calling remote thread. Use this instead of invoke when the following conditions are meat: 1) The current thread is executing in the scope of a framework callback event from the render process (ex. CfrTask.Execute). 2) You need to Invoke on the webbrowser control and 3) The invoked code needs to call into the render process.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RenderThreadInvoke(System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker)
member.summary: Special Invoke for framework callbacks from the render process. Maintains the thread within the context of the calling remote thread. Use this instead of invoke when the following conditions are meat: 1) The current thread is executing in the scope of a framework callback event from the render process (ex. CfrTask.Execute). 2) You need to Invoke on the webbrowser control and 3) The invoked code needs to call into the render process.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.EvaluateJavascript(System.String,System.Action{Chromium.Remote.CfrV8Value,Chromium.Remote.CfrV8Exception})
member.summary:
Evaluate a string of javascript code in the browser's main frame. Evaluation is done asynchronously in the render process. Returns false if the remote browser is currently unavailable. If this function returns false, then |callback| will not be called. Otherwise, |callback| will be called asynchronously in the context of the render thread and, if RemoteCallbackInvokeMode is set to Invoke, on the thread that owns the browser's underlying window handle.
Use with care: The callback may never be called if the render process gets killed prematurely. On success the CfrV8Value argument of the callback will be set to the return value of the evaluated script, if any. On failure the CfrV8Exception argument of the callback will be set to the exception thrown by the evaluated script, if any. Do not block the callback since it blocks the render thread.
*** WARNING *** In CEF 3.2623 and higher, the return value of the evaluation seems to be broken in some cases (see also issue #65).

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.EvaluateJavascript(System.String,Chromium.WebBrowser.JSInvokeMode,System.Action{Chromium.Remote.CfrV8Value,Chromium.Remote.CfrV8Exception})
member.summary:
Evaluate a string of javascript code in the browser's main frame. Evaluation is done asynchronously in the render process. Returns false if the remote browser is currently unavailable. If this function returns false, then |callback| will not be called. Otherwise, |callback| will be called asynchronously in the context of the render thread.
If |invokeMode| is set to Invoke, |callback| will be called on the thread that owns the browser's underlying window handle. If |invokeMode| is set to Inherit, |callback| will be called according to RemoteCallbackInvokeMode.
Use with care: The callback may never be called if the render process gets killed prematurely. On success the CfrV8Value argument of the callback will be set to the return value of the evaluated script, if any. On failure the CfrV8Exception argument of the callback will be set to the exception thrown by the evaluated script, if any. Do not block the callback since it blocks the render thread.
*** WARNING *** In CEF 3.2623 and higher, the return value of the evaluation seems to be broken in some cases (see also issue #65).

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.GlobalObject
member.summary: Represents the main frame's global javascript object (window). Any changes to the global object's properties will be available after the next time a V8 context is created in the render process for the main frame of this browser.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.GlobalObjectForFrame(System.String)
member.summary: Represents a named frame's global javascript object (window). Any changes to the global object's properties will be available after the next time a V8 context is created in the render process of this browser for a frame with this name.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.VisitDom(System.Action{Chromium.Remote.CfrDomDocument,Chromium.Remote.CfrBrowser})
member.summary:
Visit the DOM in the remote browser's main frame. Returns false if the remote browser is currently unavailable. If this function returns false, then |callback| will not be called. Otherwise, |callback| will be called according to the InvokeMode setting.
The document object passed to the callback represents a snapshot of the DOM at the time the callback is executed. DOM objects are only valid for the scope of the callback. Do not keep references to or attempt to access any DOM objects outside the scope of the callback. Use with care: The callback may never be called if the render process gets killed prematurely. Do not keep a reference to the remote DOM or remote browser object after returning from the callback. Do not block the callback since it blocks the renderer thread. Explicitly Dispose() all CfrDomNode objects, otherwise the render process may become unstable and crash.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.OnV8ContextCreated
member.summary:
Called immediately after the V8 context for a frame has been created. To retrieve the JavaScript 'window' object use the CfrV8Context.GetGlobal() function. V8 handles can only be accessed from the thread on which they are created. A task runner for posting tasks on the associated thread can be retrieved via the CfrV8Context.GetTaskRunner() function.
All javascript properties/functions defined through GlobalObject or GlobalObjectForFrame are made available before this event is executed.
If RemoteCallbackInvokeMode is set to Invoke, then this event is executed on the thread that owns the browser's underlying window handle.
member.remarks: See also the original CEF documentation in cef/include/capi/cef_render_process_handler_capi.h.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.SetWebResource(System.String,Chromium.WebBrowser.WebResource)
member.summary: Set a resource to be used for the specified URL. Note that these resources are kept in the memory. If you need to handle a lot of custom web resources, subscribing to RequestHandler.GetResourceHandler and loading from disk on demand might be a better choice.

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RemoveWebResource(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a resource previously set for the specified URL.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.BrowserCreated
member.summary: Raised after the CfxBrowser object for this WebBrowser has been created. The event is executed on the thread that owns this browser control's underlying window handle.

member.name: E:Chromium.WebBrowser.ChromiumWebBrowser.RemoteBrowserCreated
member.summary:
Called after a remote browser has been created. When browsing cross-origin a new browser will be created before the old browser is destroyed.
Applications may keep a reference to the CfrBrowser object outside the scope of this event, but you have to be aware that those objects become invalid as soon as the framework swaps render processes and/or recreates browsers.

member.name: T:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSObject
member.summary: Represents a javascript object in the render process to be added as a property to a browser frame's global object or to another JSObject.

member.summary: Creates a new javascript object to be added as a property to a browser frame's global object or a child object.

member.summary: Modes for the JSProperty.InvokeMode property.

member.name: F:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSInvokeMode.Inherit
member.summary: Inherit from parent object. This is the default mode for javascript properties.

member.name: F:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSInvokeMode.Invoke
member.summary: Callbacks from the render process are executed on the thread that owns the browser's underlying window handle within the context of the calling remote thread. This is the default mode for the webbrowser object.

member.name: F:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSInvokeMode.DontInvoke
member.summary: Callback from the render process are executed on the worker thread which marshals the callback.

member.name: T:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSProperty
member.summary: Represents a javascript property in the render process to be added to a browser frame's global object or to a child object.

member.summary: The type of this property.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSProperty.InvokeMode
member.summary: The invoke mode for this property. See also JSInvokeMode. Changes to the invoke mode will be effective after the next time the browser creates a V8 context for the target frame.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSProperty.WillInvoke
member.summary: Indicates whether render process callbacks on this javascript property will be executed on the thread that owns the browser's underlying window handle. Depends on the invoke mode and, if invoke mode is inherit, also on the parent object's and/or browser's invoke mode.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSProperty.Name
member.summary: The name of this property. May be null if this property is still unbound.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSProperty.Browser
member.summary: The browser this javascript property or the parent javascript object belongs to. May be null if this property or it's parent is still unbound.

member.name: P:Chromium.WebBrowser.JSProperty.Parent
member.summary: The parent javascript object of this property. May be null if this property is still unbound.

member.summary: Custom web resource for registration with a ChromiumWebBrowser control.

member.summary: Creates a WebResource for registration with a ChromiumWebBrowser control.

member.summary: Creates a WebResource from the given image for registration with a ChromiumWebBrowser control. The mime type will be image/png

member.name: M:Chromium.WebBrowser.WebResource.#ctor(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Creates a WebResource from the given image for registration with a ChromiumWebBrowser control. The mime type will be set according to the image format.

member.summary: Creates a WebResource from the given text for registration with a ChromiumWebBrowser control. The mime type will be text/html
